io.sphere.internal.request

Class ProductRequestFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.internal.request.ProductRequestFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductRequestFactory

    public class ProductRequestFactoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductRequestFactory
    Converts products from the raw BackendProductProjection to Product.

      Creates a request that fetches a single Product, implemented using a query endpoint.

      Creates a request that uses the query API to find products.
